definitions.definition: Refusal to conform to the doctrine , discipline , or practice of a state religion , especially refusal by other Protestants to conform to the doctrine or discipline of the Church of England ; the principles or practice of nonconformists ; nonconformists as a class.
Rejection of, or failure to conform to, a practice, standard , rule , or law .
A type of unconformity in which a non- sedimentary rock intrudes in sedimentary layers .

main_definition: Refusal to conform to the doctrine , discipline , or practice of a state religion , especially refusal by other Protestants to conform to the doctrine or discipline of the Church of England ; the principles or practice of nonconformists ; nonconformists as a class.
secondary_definitions: Rejection of, or failure to conform to, a practice, standard , rule , or law .
( geology ) A type of unconformity in which a non- sedimentary rock intrudes in sedimentary layers .
